name: 10 Pot Luck 2 Questions | Mixed 10 Questions Trivia Quiz

questions.text: Which of the following is not a vine?
Ghee is a kind of what, usually used in Indian cooking?
questions.explanation:
Butter.

	It is a semi fluid clarified butter.

questions.text: 'Waltzing Matilda' is the unofficial national song of what country?
questions.explanation:
Australia.

	The official national anthem of Australia is "Advance Australia Fair".

questions.text: Which is not a female animal?
questions.explanation:
Gander.

	It is a male goose.

questions.text: Who was the president of the U.S. at the outbreak of the Korean War?
Napoleon was exiled to what island?
Quarks would be studied in which scientific field?
questions.explanation:
Physics.

	There are six types of quarks, known as flavors: up, down, strange, charm, bottom, and top.

questions.text: Ken Stabler played his college football where?
What college team has the nickname the 'Lobos'?
Huntz Hall played who in the 'Bowery Boys'?
